amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendment Nos. 35, 36, 40, 41, 42, 44, 46, 50, 51, 52, 53, 55, 59, 60, 65, 66, and 67 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lofgren amendments (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A021) offered by Ms. Lofgren.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lofgren amendments (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A021) offered by Ms. Lofgren.
